vulnerability.label: Automatic login
vulnerability.name: Automatic login
vulnerability.description: With automatic login enabled, anyone can authenticate himlself as the default user.

vulnerability.label: Cloud hosted PZH
vulnerability.name: Cloud hosted PZH
vulnerability.description: Vulnerabilities associated with the virtual appliance hosting a PZH also affect the PZH.

vulnerability.label: Improper privacy protection
vulnerability.name: Improper privacy protection
vulnerability.description: Sensitive data do not have more protection than other data.

vulnerability.label: Improper timeout
vulnerability.name: Improper timeout
vulnerability.description: The session is not automatically closed after a reasonable period of inactivity.

vulnerability.label: Lack of data provenance
vulnerability.name: Lack of data provenance
vulnerability.description: An attacker can abuse the lack of provenance associated with context and event data to bypass policy enforcement mechanisms.

vulnerability.label: Permissive convergence preferences
vulnerability.name: Permissive convergence preferences
vulnerability.description: Permissive convergence preferences might be unintentionally linkable to other webinos applications.

vulnerability.label: Weak credential
vulnerability.name: Weak credential
vulnerability.description: A weak credential may be easily broken by an attacker.

vulnerability.label: Weak cryptography
vulnerability.name: Weak cryptography
vulnerability.description: Data is encrypted using a weak cryptographical algorithm.

vulnerability.label: System data trust
vulnerability.name: System data trust
vulnerability.description: Security based on event locations is insecure and can be spoofed.

threat.label: Asymmetric resource consumption
threat.name: Asymmetric resource consumption
threat.description: The attacker forces the victim to consume more resources than it should be allowed.

threat.label: Autologin abuse
threat.name: Autologin abuse
threat.description: If the autologin is enabled, an attacker can authenticate himself as the default user.

threat.label: NFC replay attack
threat.name: NFC replay attack
threat.description: Using a ghost and leech device, an attack forwards a request to the victim's reader device and relays the answer back in real time via a webinos overlay network.

threat.label: Session hijacking
threat.name: Session hijacking
threat.description: The attack exploits the web session control mechanism to hijack the user session.
